custom-block.comment: IP-Adresse für Wemos in dieser Blockdefinition anpassen --- adapt IP address for Wemos in this block definition
IP-Adresse für Arduino in dieser Blockdefinition anpassen --- adapt IP address for Arduino in this block definition

block.comment: LED an Pin D2 blinken lassen, korrekte Boardnummer eintragen --- blink LED on pin D2, insert correct board number

custom-block.s: Actuator: write digital state %b to pin %txt on board %n
Actuator: write digital state %b to pin %txt on board %n

block.comment: analogen Sensor an Pin A0 auslesen und Wert auf der Bühne anzeigen, korrekte Boardnummer eintragen (z. B. Helligkeitssensor oder Drehregler) --- read analog sensor pin A0 and show current value on stage, insert correct board number (e. g. brightness sensor or rotary potentiometer)

custom-block.s: Sensor: read analog value from pin A0 on board %n

block.comment: analogen Sensor an Pin A0 auslesen und Wert auf der Bühne anzeigen, korrekte Boardnummer eintragen (z. B. Helligkeitssensor oder Drehregler) --- read analog sensor pin A0 and show current value on stage, insert correct board number (e. g. brightness sensor or rotary potentiometer)

custom-block.s: Buzzer: play tones on pin %txt on board %n %cs

block-definition.translations: de:sende Kommando _ an Arduino _

block-definition.s: send command %'c' to board %'a'

block-definition.s: substring of text %'t' starting with position %'n'
Sensor: read digital state from pin %'X' on Arduino %'n'
block-definition.translations: de:Sensor: lies digitalen Zustand von Pin _ an Arduino _

inputs.input: D2D2 D3 D4 D5 D6 D7 D8 D9 D10 D11 D12 D13

block-definition.translations: de:Sensor: lies analogen Wert von Pin _ an Arduino _

block-definition.translations: de:Aktor: schreibe digitalen Zustand _ an Pin _ von Arduino _

inputs.input: D2D2 D3 D4 D5 D6 D7 D8 D9 D10 D11 D12 D13

block-definition.s: Actuator: write analog value %'X' to pin %'Y' on Arduino %'A'
block-definition.translations: de:Aktor: schreibe analogen Wert _ an Pin _ von Arduino _

inputs.input: D3D3 D5 D6 D9 D10 D11

block-definition.s: Buzzer: play tones on pin %'Y' on Arduino %'A' %'S'
block-definition.translations: de:Summer: spiele Töne an Pin _ von Arduino _ _

inputs.input: D2D2 D3 D4 D5 D6 D7 D8 D9 D10 D11 D12 D13

block.l: sum = 0; for(i = 0; i <= durations.length; i++) { if(parseInt(durations[i]) > 0) { sum += 1000/parseInt(durations[i]); } } return sum/1000;

block-definition.s: Buzzer: tone %'T' with duration %'D'
block-definition.translations: de:Summer: Ton _ mit Notenwert _

inputs.input: C3pause B0 C1 CS1 D1 DS1 E1 F1 FS1 G1 GS1 A1 AS1 B1 C2 CS2 D2 DS2 E2 F2 FS2 G2 GS2 A2 AS2 B2 C3 CS3 D3 DS3 E3 F3 FS3 G3 GS3 A3 AS3 B3 C4 CS4 D4 DS4 E4 F4 FS4 G4 GS4 A4 AS4 B4

block.l: if(typeof tones == "undefined" || typeof durations == "undefined") return; if(T == "pause") { tones.push(0); } if(T == "B0") { tones.push(31); } if(T == "C1") { tones.push(33); } if(T == "CS1") { tones.push(35); } if(T == "D1") { tones.push(37); } if(T == "DS1") { tones.push(39); } if(T == "E1") { tones.push(41); } if(T == "F1") { tones.push(44); } if(T == "FS1") { tones.push(46); } if(T == "G1") { tones.push(49);
